data.eml:eml: A taxonomic study on the genus Harpapion Voss, 1966 from China (Coleoptera, Apionidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zhiliang, Alonso-Zarazaga, Miguel A., Zhang, Runzhi (2013): A taxonomic study on the genus Harpapion Voss, 1966 from China (Coleoptera, Apionidae). ZooKeys 358: 25-44, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6136, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.358.6136
